meaningMnemonic:
To <kanji>fly</kanji> and <kanji>leap</kanji> is <vocabulary>leaping</vocabulary>.

飛躍 is mainly used in a figurative way to highlight remarkable progress in areas like personal growth or technological advancement. It can also describe a logic that jumps suddenly from one point to another without clear connections.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
